name: Dectorio
title: 装饰元素与彩灯
author: PantherX
description: 增加装饰元素美化你的工厂.目前包括彩色信号,链条,石材,混凝土墙,木地板,以及可画的具体款式.
description_original: Adds decorative elements to beautify your factory. Currently includes coloured signals, wooden, chain-link, stone and concrete walls, wooden floorboards and painted concrete styles.
